descr: "Used to record and send details about a request for referral service or transfer of a patient to the care of another provider or provider organization."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a ReferralRequest resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "Business identifier that uniquely identifies the referral/care transfer request instance."

fields.name: definition
fields.descr: "A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this request."

fields.name: basedOn
fields.descr: "Indicates any plans, proposals or orders that this request is intended to satisfy - in whole or in part."

fields.name: replaces
fields.descr: "Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request."

fields.name: groupIdentifier
fields.descr: "The business identifier of the logical \"grouping\" request/order that this referral is a part of."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of the authorization/intention reflected by the referral request record."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: intent
fields.descr: "Distinguishes the \"level\" of authorization/demand implicit in this request."

fields.name: _intent
fields.descr: "Extensions for intent"

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "An indication of the type of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request."

fields.name: priority
fields.descr: "An indication of the urgency of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request."

fields.name: _priority
fields.descr: "Extensions for priority"

fields.name: serviceRequested
fields.descr: "The service(s) that is/are requested to be provided to the patient.  For example: cardiac pacemaker insertion."

fields.name: subject
fields.descr: "The patient who is the subject of a referral or transfer of care request."

fields.name: context
fields.descr: "The encounter at which the request for referral or transfer of care is initiated."

fields.name: occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "The period of time within which the services identified in the referral/transfer of care is specified or required to occur."

fields.name: _occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "Extensions for occurrenceDateTime"

fields.name: occurrencePeriod
fields.descr: "The period of time within which the services identified in the referral/transfer of care is specified or required to occur."

fields.name: authoredOn
fields.descr: "Date/DateTime of creation for draft requests and date of activation for active requests."

fields.name: _authoredOn
fields.descr: "Extensions for authoredOn"

fields.name: requester
fields.descr: "The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation."

fields.name: specialty
fields.descr: "Indication of the clinical domain or discipline to which the referral or transfer of care request is sent.  For example: Cardiology Gastroenterology Diabetology."

fields.name: recipient
fields.descr: "The healthcare provider(s) or provider organization(s) who/which is to receive the referral/transfer of care request."

fields.name: reasonCode
fields.descr: "Description of clinical condition indicating why referral/transfer of care is requested.  For example:  Pathological Anomalies, Disabled (physical or mental),  Behavioral Management."

fields.name: reasonReference
fields.descr: "Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "The reason element gives a short description of why the referral is being made, the description expands on this to support a more complete clinical summary."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: supportingInfo
fields.descr: "Any additional (administrative, financial or clinical) information required to support request for referral or transfer of care.  For example: Presenting problems/chief complaints Medical History Family History Alerts Allergy/Intolerance and Adverse Reactions Medications Observations/Assessments (may include cognitive and fundtional assessments) Diagnostic Reports Care Plan."

fields.name: note
fields.descr: "Comments made about the referral request by any of the participants."

fields.name: relevantHistory
fields.descr: "Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource."
